description: The pink shower (Cassia nealiae 'Queen's Hospital White') is an amazing plant species for many reasons. Not only does it burst with vibrant clusters of deep pink blossoms, but it can also reach as tall as fifteen feet in ideal conditions. It is an easy plant to maintain and its large, dense canopy provides a plethora of niches for wildlife to take shelter. Furthermore, it is an excellent source of nectar for both birds and bees, making it a great addition to any garden. Its lush green foliage is also an attractive addition to any landscape. The pink shower is an impressive plant species that's definitely worth looking into. It's the perfect way to liven up any environment.
